704730.name: Neofeud - Soundtrack
704730.description:
The Neofeud soundtrack consists of 46 tracks clocking in at 2 1/2 hours of music. It was composed by Christian Miller, the one-person developer of Neofeud.

Inspired by everything from Bladerunner synthscapes to 80's 8-bit nostalgia, from Game of Thrones grandeur to machine-raging rock and industrial, the Neofeud soundtrack reflects the stratified cyberpunk world of the game itself.
